full_text: Page 1624 New York, New York 10007 Office: (646) 836-6334 Fax: (646) 83(b)(6); (b)(7)(C) E-mail: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov If you are emailing about an inmate that may be at risk for suicide or self-harm, this is an emergency situation. Please make sure that you make contact (verbally) to Psychology Staff or the on-call psychologist. Please ensure to maintain constant visual observation of the inmate until formal steps can be taken to ensure his/her safety pending a formal assessment by a Psychologist. >>> Charisma Edge 11/13/2019 8:55 AM >>> FYI...AW portion for page 10 regarding SW cell assignment. There are highlighted sections that need some more information: p. 5: Correctional Services re expunged incident report p. 10: AWP/Correctional Services re Lt rounds and C&A follow up p. 11: HSA re approval of documentation for new procedures to inspect AEDs Psychology re NERO waiver attachment Page 7991 DOJ-OGR-00025679

text_blocks.content: New York, New York 10007 Office: (646) 836-6334 Fax: (646) 83(b)(6); (b)(7)(C) E-mail: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov

If you are emailing about an inmate that may be at risk for suicide or self-harm, this is an emergency situation. Please make sure that you make contact (verbally) to Psychology Staff or the on-call psychologist. Please ensure to maintain constant visual observation of the inmate until formal steps can be taken to ensure his/her safety pending a formal assessment by a Psychologist.
>>> Charisma Edge 11/13/2019 8:55 AM >>> FYI...AW portion for page 10 regarding SW cell assignment.
Charisma Edge Associate Warden MCC New York 150 Park Row New York, NY 10007 646-836-6300 ext (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov NYM/AW-Programs-@bop.gov

>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 11/12/2019 1:31 PM >>> We are in the home stretch. There are highlighted sections that need some more information: p. 5: Correctional Services re expunged incident report p. 10: AWP/Correctional Services re Lt rounds and C&A follow up p. 11: HSA re approval of documentation for new procedures to inspect AEDs Psychology re NERO waiver attachment

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) and (b)(5), indicating sensitive information has been removed for privacy or security reasons.
